mean_cn: n.代表（读作/ˈdɛləgɪt/）；  v.委派……为代表
mean_en: a person who is chosen or elected to represent the views of a group of people and vote and make decisions for them
sentence: Delegates from both nations signed the peace agreement.
sentence_trans: 两个国家的代表签订了和平协议。
word_etyma: de使…成为，加强 + leg法律 + ate动词后缀 → 加强法律 → delegate授权
